name: admin.conversations.unlinkObjects
desc: Unlink a Salesforce record from a channel

channel.desc: Channel ID for Slack channel that will be unlinked from the Salesforce record.

new_name.desc: Channel name you would like to give to the channel that is being unlinked from the Salesforce record.

errors.restricted_action: User does not have access to perform this action.
errors.invalid_name_specials: Value passed for `name` contained unallowed special characters or upper case characters.
errors.name_taken: A channel cannot be created with the given name.
